notification.bodytemp:
Congratulations! Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is approved. Please note you will also receive a status notification for each Service Application you submitted.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is Deferred. Please contact the HHS Accelerator Team if you have questions about this status.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Business Application - Returned for Revisions
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Business Application has been Returned for Revision. If your organization wishes to complete its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: You can disregard this message if your organization already submitted a renewal application through PASSPort. If you started a renewal application in HHS Accelerator but did not submit it or receive approval for it, please restart the application in PASSPort.

Congratulations! Your HHS Accelerator Service Application for {#SERVICE} is approved. Please note you will receive a status notification for each Service Application you submitted.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

Your HHS Accelerator Service Application for {#SERVICE} is Deferred. Please note you will receive a status notification for each Service Application you submitted.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Service Application - {#SERVICE} - Returned for Revisions
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Service Application for {#SERVICE} has been Returned for Revision. HHS Prequalification is now hosted in PASSPort – it is streamlined and easier than ever to complete! Service Applications are no longer required for HHS Prequalification. If your organization wishes to complete its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
While a Service Application is no longer required, it is recommended that organizations identify the services that they are able to deliver through PASSPort Commodity Codes in order to receive targeted communications for specific contracting opportunities.

The {#DOCUMENT TYPE} with a name of {#DOCUMENT NAME} has been Returned for Revision by the HHS Accelerator team. To restore your Provider Status and eligibility to receive RFPs through the HHS Accelerator system, you must upload a current filing or extension document.
Reason: {#Provider Comments from the Task Details}
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and upload a new document.
Document Vault

Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is Conditionally Approved. Within the next 90 days, you must login to HHS Accelerator using the link below and complete and submit your organization's application.
Summary of Applications

Your HHS Accelerator Service Application for {#SERVICE} is Conditionally Approved. Please note you will also receive a status notification for each Service Application you submitted.
Within the next 90 days. you must complete and submit your Service Application for {#SERVICE}.
HHS Accelerator Log In

Your request for an HHS Accelerator account is approved. HHS Accelerator offers digital budgeting and invoicing for human services contracts. Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator using your NYC ID.
HHS Accelerator Log In
HHS Prequalification is now hosted in PASSPort - it is streamlined and easier to complete! If your organization wishes to begin the HHS Prequalification application process or has a pending prequalification application in HHS Accelerator, you must submit a new application in PASSPort. To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
PASSPort is also the central platform to find and respond to human services RFPs. Organizations must have a PASSPort account and be prequalified to submit a response to a human services RFP.
To learn more about PASSPort or if you need assistance, please visit www.nyc.gov/mocshelp for resources and the MOCS Service Desk contact form.

Your request for an HHS Accelerator account has not been approved. An HHS Accelerator account is required to manage many human services contract budgets and invoices.
If your organization wishes to become prequalified to respond to human services RFPs, the prequalification process is now available through PASSPort. It is streamlined and easier than ever to complete! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
PASSPort is also the central platform to find and respond to human services RFPs. Organizations must have a PASSPort account and be prequalified to submit a response to a human services RFP.
For more information about HHS Accelerator or PASSPort, please visit www.nyc.gov/mocshelp for resources and the MOCS Service Desk contact form.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Withdrawal Request Approved - Business Review Application
notification.bodytemp: HHS Accelerator approved your request to withdraw your Business application.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Withdrawal Request Denied - Business Review Application
notification.bodytemp:
HHS Accelerator denied your request to withdraw your Business Application.
Reason: {#Provider Comments from the Task Details}

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator - Withdrawal Request Approved - Service Application - {#SERVICE}
notification.bodytemp:
HHS Accelerator approved your request to withdraw your Service Application for {#SERVICE}. Please note this does not affect the status of other Service Applications.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Withdrawal Request Denied - Service Application - {#SERVICE}
notification.bodytemp:
HHS Accelerator has denied your request to withdraw your Service Application for {#SERVICE}. Please note this does not affect the status of other Service Applications.
Reason: {#Provider Comments from the Task Details}
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

{#NAME} requested access to HHS Accelerator for your organization. Please use the link below to review the request.
Members and Users

{#USERNAME}
Your HHS Accelerator user account request has not been approved. Please contact your organization's Account Administrator for more information.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Filing Expiring in {#LEFTDAYS} Days - {#DOCUMENT TYPE}
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization's {#DOCUMENT TYPE} filing will be out of date in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to remain prequalified, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a new HHS Prequalification application through PASSPort you can disregard this message.

The HHS Accelerator Team is sending you an early reminder that your HHS Accelerator Application will expire on {#MMDDYYYY}. Your organization will remain eligible to receive RFPs through the HHS Accelerator system until the expiration date. You may submit a new Business Application and at least one Service Application for your organization at any time between now and the expiration date.
If you would like to start a new HHS Accelerator Application for your organization, please use the link below.
Summary of Applications

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Application is Expiring in {#LEFTDAYS} Days
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Prequalification Application will expire in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to renew its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: You can disregard this message if your organization already submitted a renewal application through PASSPort. If you started a renewal application in HHS Accelerator but did not submit it or receive approval for it, please restart the application in PASSPort.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Application is Expiring - {#LEFTDAYS} Days
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Prequalification Application will expire in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to renew its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Prequalification Application is Expired. If your organization wishes to renew its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a renewal application through HHS Accelerator, that was approved by the HHS Accelerator Team, you can disregard this message. If you started a renewal application in HHS Accelerator but did not submit it or receive approval for it, please restart the application in PASSPort.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Provider Status Suspended - Lapsed - {#DOCUMENT TYPE} Filing
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization's HHS Accelerator Provider Status has been Suspended because your {#DOCUMENT TYPE} filing is out of date. If your organization wishes to remain prequalified, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a new HHS Prequalification application through PASSPort you can disregard this message.

You have changed your NYC.ID Email Address/Username to {#NEWEMAIL}. Please use the link below to activate your new NYC.ID login. If you did not request this change, the Mayor's Office of Contract Services (MOCS) is happy to assist you. Please visit www.nyc.gov/mocshelp for resources and the MOCS Service Desk contact form.

{#USERNAME}
You have requested a NYC.ID password reset from the HHS Accelerator system. Please click the link below to reset your NYC.ID password.
If you did not request this reset, no action is required.
NYC.ID Password Reset

You have changed your NYC.ID Email Address/Username to {#NEWEMAIL}. Please use the link below to activate your new NYC.ID login. If you did not request this change, the Mayor's Office of Contract Services (MOCS) is happy to assist you. MOCS can be contacted via www.nyc.gov/mocshelp.

Congratulations! Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is approved. Please note you will also receive a status notification for each Service Application you submitted.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is Deferred. Please contact the HHS Accelerator Team if you have questions about this status.
Please use the link below to login to HHS Accelerator and view your application summary.
Summary of Applications

Your HHS Accelerator Business Application is Conditionally Approved for 90 days. Once you meet the conditions to become fully approved, you must submit a new Prequalification Application in PASSPort, the City’s digital Procurement and Sourcing Solutions Portal, by clicking this link. You must have an active Prequalification Application to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and certain Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
Please use the link below to start a new HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort.
PASSPort

An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a new HHS Prequalification application through PASSPort you can disregard this message.

Your organization's {#DOCUMENT TYPE} filing will be out of date in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to remain prequalified, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a new HHS Prequalification application through PASSPort you can disregard this message.

Your organization's {#DOCUMENT TYPE} filing will be out of date in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to remain prequalified, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: If you already submitted a new HHS Prequalification application through PASSPort you can disregard this message.

notification.subjecttemp: HHS Accelerator Application is Expiring in {#LEFTDAYS} days
notification.bodytemp:
Your organization’s HHS Accelerator Prequalification Application will expire in {#LEFTDAYS} days. If your organization wishes to renew its HHS Prequalification, please submit a new application in PASSPort. PASSPort HHS Prequalification is streamlined and easier than ever! To complete an HHS Prequalification Application in PASSPort, you must have a PASSPort account. Click here to create a PASSPort account using your NYC.ID or to log into an existing PASSPort account. The same NYC.ID login credentials you use to access HHS Accelerator may be used to login or create an account in PASSPort.
Once logged into your PASSPort account, follow the instructions below to begin the HHS Prequalification Application process in PASSPort:
1. Navigate to the RFx tab on the top banner and select Browse Prequalified Lists from the dropdown.
2. Search for the HHS Accelerator Prequalification application and click on the PQL label to access the application.
3. Click the Create New Application button located at the top of the page, complete the questionnaire, and click Submit for Review.
An active Prequalification Application is required to be eligible to receive human services RFPs and many Discretionary awards. Please note that PASSPort is the central portal for all RFPs, including human services RFPs.
PLEASE NOTE: You can disregard this message if your organization already submitted a renewal application through PASSPort. If you started a renewal application in HHS Accelerator but did not submit it or receive approval for it, please restart the application in PASSPort.
